examples.example: 我今天感觉有一点儿累，但还是很开心能完成所有的工作。

translate.english: I feel a little tired today, but still very happy to be able to finish all the work.

examples.example: 我对接下来的挑战有一点儿紧张，但更多的是期待和兴奋。

translate.english: I am a little nervous about the next challenges, but more of anticipation and excitement.

examples.example: 我对新环境有一点儿陌生，但相信很快就能适应。

translate.english: I am a little strange to the new environment, but I believe I can adapt to it soon.
